articles.content-en: Today is the day before the travel. Me and my father prepared for it. My sister and mother already left for Japan. I'm desperate to go to Japan.
articles.content-ja: 今日は飛行機に乗る前日です。僕と父は荷造りを終え、妹と母親はすでに日本にいます。ようやく日本へ「仮釈放」される...

articles.content-en: Today is the day. The travel day. We are going to take two flights: one is from Pittsburgh to Chicago and another one is from Chicago to Tokyo. I hope the weather is good at Tokyo...
articles.content-ja: 今日は、出発当日。飛行機を2便乗り継ぎます。ピッツバーグからシカゴへ、そしてシカゴから東京へ。着いた直後の天気が心配だが...
